Module org.nasdanika.common
Package org.nasdanika.common

Interface ResourceLocator

Type Parameters:
T -
All Superinterfaces:
Composeable<Context>, Context
All Known Implementing Classes:
EModelElementAnnotationResourceLocator, LocaleLanguageResourceLocator, RussianResourceLocator, SimpleMutableResourceLocator, UI
public interface ResourceLocator extends Context
A marker interface to indicate a source of resources, for example, localized strings.

Pavel
